description: The Gundam Meister who pilots the http://anidb.net/ch2212 [Gundam Exia]. He was born in the wartorn Republic of Krugis, where he fought as a child soldier and was saved by the intervention of http://anidb.net/ch2420 [a mysterious Gundam]. After this experience he went on to join the private armed organization http://anidb.net/ch2214 [Celestial Being] under the alias Setsuna F Seiei. He is a quiet and reserved young man who keeps his emotions to himself, but his actions are sometimes impulsive and unpredictable.
name: Setsuna F Seiei
